text: Iwo amene adayankha kuitana kwa Ambuye wawo ali ndi mphotho yamtengo wapatali. Koma iwo amene adakana kuitana kwake, ngakhale kuti akadakhala ndi chuma chonse chimene chili pa dziko lapansi ndi china choonjezera kuti chikakhale ngati dipo lawo; chawo chidzakhala chiweruzo choipa. Gahena ndiyo idzakhala mudzi wawo womwe ndi malo onyansa okhalamo
